title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with musket, bayonet and scabbard, Bowie knife, and revolver] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with musket, bayonet and scabbard, Bowie knife, and revolver] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-52. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: Normal Civil War Antiques, Normal, Illinois, 2002. Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Bayonets--1860-1870. Knives--1860-1870. Handguns--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27023 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2168
